dcterms:creator: E. R. Keydel
S. W. Lee
J. T. Moore
dcterms:description: The MSTAR dataset includes ten different categories of military vehicles in spotlight mode within full aspect, with a resolution of 0.3 m x 0.3 m. It was collected by the STARLOS sensor and includes various conditions such as target occlusion, camouflage, and configuration changes.
dcterms:title: MSTAR dataset
